name: boomy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making a deep, loud, hollow sound: They grew up listening to a preacher who warned of fire and brimstone with his big, boomy voice. The sound in the auditorium was much too boomy on the bass. Related word
boomSynonym
booming
More examplesFewer examplesCars passed with their windows rolled down, boomy stereos blaring. The 18th century-style cello was less boomy in the bottom register than modern ones.It was difficult to hear the video presentation because of the boomy acoustics. The big, boomy orchestration of the piece was a little excessive after a few minutes.
